definition: roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: The man-made water system wanders 7 kilometers long, reaching every corner of the scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒七公里長的人工水系四通八達環繞着整個景區。

sentences.english: Railways ramified all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路四通八達遍佈全國。

sentences.english: Beautiful scenery, is extremely advantageous geographical conditions, water and land transportation accessible.
sentences.chinese: 山水秀麗，地理條件十分優越，水陸交通四通八達。

sentences.english: One reason the city is so popular is easy access to the rest of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 布魯塞爾如此受歡迎的一個原因是這裏的四通八達。

sentences.english: Traffic lines here radiate in all directions.
The freshwater transportation occupies an important position in the province and trunk railways radiates in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 內河運輸在省內居重要地位，鐵路幹線四通八達。

sentences.english: The traffic of Kuning is leading everywhere.
The countryside is veined by new broad highways.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村地區密佈四通八達的寬闊的新公路。

sentences.english: Oil rigs pumped on it and power lines zigzagged all over it.
sentences.chinese: 鑽塔在抽油，輸電線縱橫交借，四通八達。

sentences.english: Britain’s public transport network reaches nearly everywhere, he admits, but it is not very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 英國的公共交通網絡四通八達，但是並不十分可靠。

definition: Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
sea land air (transport, or military operations)
location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
monkey (dialect)/little monkey (affectionate term for children, subordinates)
through transport/through traffic jointly organized by different enterprises
